name: Release 3.2.0
body:
Update from the previous version by following the [update guide](docs/Updating_the_App.md).

For a full list of changes see [Milestone v3.2.0](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/milestone/3?closed=1).

Web:
- Implement URI Fragments. You can now perma link to headings. ([#83](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/83))
- Add grocery lists (this is HUGE!) ([#92](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/92))
- Greatly improve accessibility ([#99](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/99))
- Improve password inputs, with reveal button and capslock warning ([#100](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/100), [#101](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/101))
- Add french translation. ([#89](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/89))

Api:
- Clean up orphan photo files. ([#14](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/14))
- Support for docker compose V2 ([#98](https://github.com/ownrecipes/OwnRecipes/issues/98))
